nl: Prove that two elements $a, b$ of a group generate the same subgroup as $b a b^2, b a b^3$.
lean:
∀ {G : Type*} [Group G]
  (a b : G) : closure ({a, b}, Set G) = Subgroup.closure {b*a*b^2, b*a*b^3}
candidate: ∀ {G : Type*} [Group G] (a b : G), Subgroup.closure {a, b} = Subgroup.closure {b * a * b^2, b * a * b^3}
imports:
import Mathlib

open Function Fintype Subgroup Ideal Polynomial Submodule Zsqrtd
open scoped BigOperators
